articles.author: Jason Hiner
articles.title: Instead of AirPods, I'd recommend Meta Ray-Bans as the best tech deal of Black Friday 2024 - ZDNet
articles.description: A special Black Friday Meta Ray-Bans deal delivers a rare discount up to 50% off. The smart glasses have audio nearly as good as a pair of AirPods, plus you get a fast camera and a hands-free AI assistant.
articles.content:
Kerry Wan/ZDNET
The Meta Ray-Ban smart glasses have easily been the biggest surprise hit among the most popular tech products of 2024. And now that Black Friday is here, you can grab a pair for the … [+4833 chars]

articles.title: Global Foldable Smartphone Shipments Declined In Q3 2024, Despite High Customer Satisfaction With Book-Type Form Factor; Report Mentions Two Reasons For This Slump - Wccftech
articles.description: A report highlights two reasons why the global foldable smartphone shipment declined in the third quarter, despite new models entering market
articles.content: Foldable smartphones are a unique addition that occupy a higher pricier tier alongside their candy bar shaped counterparts, but the big names struggled to get the ball rolling in the third quarter of… [+2696 chars]
